description: This table extracts the dental procedure historical teeth.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the dental finding or procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_PROC_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple teeth�associated with the�procedure�and the�historical instant�from the DENTAL_PROC_HX�table

columns.name: DENT_TOOTH_HIST_ID
columns.description: Stores the revision history of the teeth for a procedure/finding.
